mapper.select: select o.id, o.outboundno as outBoundNo, o.type, o.status, o.orgid as orgId, (select name from jy_base_org where id=o.orgid) as orgName, o.inorgid as inOrgId, (select longname from jy_base_org where id=o.inorgid) as inOrgLongName, (select name from jy_base_org where id=o.inorgid) as inOrgName, o.outorgid as outOrgId, (select longname from jy_base_org where id=o.outorgid) as outOrgLongName, (select name from jy_base_org where id=o.outorgid) as outOrgName, o.ordernum as orderNum, o.remarks, o.description, o.createtime as createTime, (select u.name from jy_base_account u where o.createuser=u.id) as createName, o.checktime as checkTime, (select u.name from jy_base_account u where o.checkUser=u.id) as checkName, o.updatetime as updateTime, (select u.name from jy_base_account u where o.updateUser=u.id) as updateName, o.deletetag as deletetag, o.supplierid as supplierId, f.longname as franchiseeName, f.name as franchiseeNameShort, o.balancetype as balancetype, o.ratio as ratio, o.warehouseid as warehouseid, to_char(o.createtime,'yyyy-MM-dd') printCreate, to_char(o.updatetime,'yyyy-MM-dd') printUpdate, to_char(o.checktime,'yyyy-MM-dd') printCheck, (select sum(num) from jy_scm_ims_outbounddetail d where d.outboundno=o.outboundno) as num, (select sum(weight) from jy_scm_ims_outbounddetail d where d.outboundno=o.outboundno) as weight, (select sum(COSTING) from jy_scm_ims_outbounddetail d where d.outboundno=o.outboundno) as totalCosing, (select sum(WAGE) from jy_scm_ims_outbounddetail d where d.outboundno=o.outboundno) as totalWage, (select sum(TAGEPRICE) from jy_scm_ims_outbounddetail d where d.outboundno=o.outboundno) as totalTageprice, (select sum(PRADEPRICE) from jy_scm_ims_outbounddetail d where d.outboundno=o.outboundno) as totalPradeprice, (select sum(PRICE) from jy_scm_ims_outbounddetail d where d.outboundno=o.outboundno) as totalPrice, (select t.name from JY_DATA_DICT d join JY_DATA_DICT_ITEM t on t.dictid=d.id where d.datakey='SCM_OUTBOUND_TYPE' and t.value=o.type) as typeName from jy_scm_ims_outbound o left join jy_base_franchisee f on o.supplierid = f.id where o.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.outwarehouseid as outWarehouseId,io.outorgid as outOrgId from jy_scm_ims_outbounddetail t inner join jy_scm_ims_outbound io on io.id=t.outboundid where t.code=#{code} and io.inorgid=#{orgid} order by io.createtime
select * from JY_SCM_IMS_OUTBOUNDDETAIL d where d.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, p.code, p.name, p.warehouseid as outWarehouseId, p.locationid as outLocationId, p.count as num, p.totalweight as weight from jy_scm_ims_product p where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} union all select m.id, m.code, (select name from jy_scm_ims_material where code=m.code) as name, m.warehouseid as outWarehouseId, m.locationid as outLocationId, m.num, m.weight from jy_scm_ims_materialin m where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select m.id, m.code from jy_scm_ims_materialin m where upper(m.code) like '%'||upper(#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%' AND m.status = '3' and m.orgid=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id,p.code from jy_scm_ims_product p where upper(p.code) like '%'||upper(#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%' AND p.status = 'B' and p.orgid=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.code, c.name as name, m.availnum as num, m.availweight as weight, m.type as feeType, c.description as proRemarks, c.cernum as cerno, m.price as price, decode(m.type,1,m.availweight*m.price,2,m.availnum*m.price) as costing, m.warehouseid as outWarehouseId from jy_scm_ims_materialin m left join jy_scm_ims_material c on m.code=c.code where upper(m.code) = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m.status = '3'
and m.orgid=#{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.warehouseid=#{outWarehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select d.code as code,t.cernum as cerno,t.name as name,t.remarks as proRemarks,t.count as num,t.totalweight as weight from jy_scm_ims_purentery p left join jy_scm_ims_purenterydetail d on p.enteryno=d.enteryno left join jy_scm_ims_product t on t.code=d.code where p.enteryno=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.status='3' and p.type='0' AND t.status = 'B' and p.orgid=#{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.code,c.name as name,m.availnum as num,m.availweight as weight,m.type as feeType,c.description as proRemarks,c.cernum as cerno, m.price as price, decode(m.type,1,m.availweight*m.price,2,m.availnum*m.price) as costing from jy_scm_ims_purentery p left join jy_scm_ims_purenterydetail d on p.enteryno=d.enteryno left join jy_scm_ims_materialin m on m.code=d.code left join jy_scm_ims_material c on m.code=c.code where p.enteryno=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.status='3' and p.type='1' and m.status = '3'
and p.orgid=#{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.warehouseid=#{outWarehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update JY_SCM_IMS_OUTBOUND set deletetag=#{deleteTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.orgid as inOrgId,t.orderno as orderNum,(select name from jy_base_org where id=t.orgid) as inOrgName from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDER t where t.status='2' and t.orderno=#{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.ordertype='0'
mapper.update: update jy_scm_ims_product set status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
